title: varaguNa gambhIra
sahitya:
varaguNa gambhIra gajavadanam parshiva tanayam bhaja vighnEshvaram


anupallavi

  sthira saubhAgyakaram praNavAkAram sura bhUsuranutam sumukham sundaram


caraNam    nAga upadEshadharam sarvAdhAram nagnayEla bhArati ramaNam gaNa-
nAyakam navanidhi dAyakam tribhuvana pAlanam guru rAjapUjitam mOhanam
